product_name: The North Face Indylite Bike Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Indylite cycling jacket is there to save the day when the weather takes a turn for the worse-no need to let rain deter you from your ride. Quiet and abrasion-resistant HyVent(TM) 2.5-layer coated nylon is breathable and completely water- and windproof; taped seams prevent moisture seepage. 2-way center front zipper (with draft flap) lets you control ventilation for comfort and allows quick and easy on/off. Mesh underarm panels transport moisture away and provide additional ventilation. Zippered rear pocket lets you store a few essentials; stuff jacket inside rear pocket for travel or stowage. Stay tuned to your favorite beats-zippered chest pocket for electronics lets you route wires internally. Bindings on elliptical waist hem and sleeve cuff openings stay taut, keeping out wind and rain. The North Face women's Indylite cycling jacket sports a reflective logo to increase visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Indylite cycling jacket is there to save the day when the weather takes a turn for the worse-no need to let rain deter you from your ride.
